headline.main: BRITISH AIR CARRIER IN PHILADELPHIA YARD; Furious Is Here for Repairs After Battle in Finnish Waters

lead_paragraph: PHILADELPHIA, Oct. 14 -- Great Britain's first aircraft carrier, the 24,000-ton Furious, is in the Philadelphia Navy Yard for extensive repairs and a general overhauling, it was disclosed today.
abstract: Brit Capt A G Talbot describes Brit attack on Petsamo and Kirkenes, Finland
snippet: PHILADELPHIA, Oct. 14 -- Great Britain's first aircraft carrier, the 24,000-ton Furious, is in the Philadelphia Navy Yard for extensive repairs and a general overhauling, it was disclosed today....

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES
